::Cerberus::

    As the pod lands he gets ready for an attack. He still do=
esn't trust these bots. He sets his gun hand to shoot to kill, and enters t=
he pod.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, November 27, 2000 1:46 AM
  Subject: Re: C=
erberus reaches the IF


  ::Zardus::

  Zardus recieves Cerebrus' transmis=
sion. He presses a button on his 
  wrist comp, which launches a small tran=
sport pod to Cerebrus' 
  location.

  "Of course," Zardus replies, "The po=
d is underway."

  He looks at Najah and Lady Hawk. "I have buisness to tak=
e care of. 
  Lady Hawk, you're stationed at this lab for now. The ship wil=
l be 
  watching you closely, so be careful. Najah, you can stay and guard =
if 
  you wish. If not, go to the cargo bay underwater. Havoc and Repressor=
 
  have brought something in. There's also a Maximal in there that is 
  b=
eing slagged by internal defences, so the ship won't let you through 
  unt=
il its done with the Maximal."

  With that Zardus turns and heads for the =
exit of the Iron Fist.


  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande8=
5@m...> wrote:
  > ::Cerberus::
  > 
  >     "Zardus," Cerberus said. "I ha=
ve now reached the Iron Fists 
  posistion, any chance I could get a lift u=
p?"


        eGroups Sponsor
